services.name: Planning 360
services.description: Planning can make the difference between a successful year/project and an unsuccessful one.With a robust process for gathering information, brainstorming ideas, defining the right strategy, financial modelling, and scenario testing, in Cubical we dominate the art of planning.

features.name: Strategy revision/definition
features.description: We revise your premises and help you define the best strategy for your business.

features.name: Action plan
features.description: Who, how, how much, when? The action plan is the base of the financial model.

features.name: Financial models
features.description: We project your results, assets, liabilities, and cash flow, to make sure your plan adds value and meets your expectations.

features.name: Scenario testing
features.description: What if? We test different scenarios to make sure we understand the limitations of your business.

features.name: KPI definition
features.description: Key Performance Indicators are designed for following up on your strategy. Every vital process needs 2-3 KPIs in order to stay connected with your operations.

features.name: Risks and mitigation plan
features.description: Identify risks that couldn impact your expected performance and construct mitigation plans with anticipation. This allows to agile and robust reactions from your management team when needed.

features.name: Decision making matrix
features.description: Definition of roles. Who decides, provides information, or makes recommendations regarding every phase/milestone defined in your plan.

services.name: Rolling Forecast
services.description: Plans are not supposed to stay at a binder in your bookshelf. Business plans need to be revised and your tactics must be adapted as new opportunities and challenges are encountered in your way to success. At Cubical, we provide you with monthly reports, forecast adjustments, and management presentations to make sure you can react on time and get to your desired bottom line.

features.name: Real vs Projected performance reports
features.description: Analysis of the real performance vs the expected. This allows management to identify successful and unproductive actions within the strategy. It is the best way to adjust the plan as the business continues its operations.

features.name: Forecast Updates
features.description: We revise your plan as the market changes and new opportunities and challenges are encountered.

features.name: KPI reports
features.description: Performance reports for management. These reports are interpreted and sent to right person within your organization.

features.name: Month Closing report and presentation
features.description: Complete reports for shareholders and directors including the real performace, risks encountered, KPIs, and forecast updates.

services.name: Process Assessment
services.description: One of the biggest challenges of growing your business is having lean and robust processes. This is the only way of using your resources optimally while having complete control of your operations. We examine your processes using the best techniques to identify wastes and risks, and summarize our findings in a way that you can easily use our assessment as the guideline for your next continuous improvement projects.

features.name: Process maps
features.description: As part of the assessment the processes are listed and mapped to identify wastes and automation opportunities.

features.name: SWOT Analysis
features.description: The strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats are listed for every process. This serves as a guideline for managers to lead improvement initiatives and leverage on the strengths of each business department.

features.name: Suggested projects by priority
features.description: Processes are interconnected and changes in one area could impact others in many ways. All the improvement initiatives suggested are described and a road map is constructed for management to implement by priority.
